statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ -4 \\ -1 \\ 3 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -4 \\ -3 \\ -3 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ -12 \\ -5 \\ 3 \\ 7 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -1 \\ 0 \\ -4 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 12 \\ 32 \\ 12 \\ -12 \\ -18 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
